I spoke with the Pharmacist 5 mins before they went to lunch an my doctor sent the prescription over to them only to be told I was a liar an they never said to rush the prescription and they filled it before I got there but they just came back from lunch. They claim i was not a customer so I know since they say that I was last to receive it. If they had it but they lied.

I have been using this pharmacy going on a year now. The female pharmacist have been doing well with working with me on my prescription. April 22, 24, there was a man who was operating the front store when I called to check front store hours that had hung up the phone. I called later to confirm front store hours and a lady picked up and I told her what happened and she told me what time they closed. They close at 8pm and I arrived at 7:43pm. When I arrived the man who worked the front store was standing outside the store and I didn't feel safe going in but I needed to get an over the counter prescription my nurse suggested I get. So I went in and there's nearly 15 minutes until closing so I go get the over the counter medication; the man turns on and off the light when I come to front of store and the woman comes out.
I check out and go outside the man is back outside standing in front of store but I wanted to use a coupon on my receipt for the purchase, so go in to do so and ask the lady if she works there due to the item being a female item. I talk to the lady about returning the purchase and using the coupon and she goes on to talk as though it was something wrong with the request and said, "I can do it but you just purchased this and technically we're not supposed to do that." I say I'm not sure why you're saying there's anything wrong with using this coupon I just got I'm not aware about this store and coupons how that is anything wrong, she says sorry and I grabbed my items and recipt and left.  I called another pharmacy and they did handle the return and allowed me to use the coupon, which was nice and the pharmacist also looked up why I wasn't receiving my prescription from my pharmacy, I feel they performed great customer service. I feel unappreciated as a customer that's been coming to this pharmacy for awhile and also it was a bad customer service experience for the most part so I give 2 stars.

NEVER AGAIN! Will I use this pharmacy . I went yesterday which was May 22,2023 and I got there about 6:45 there was one other person was in front of me in line . When I got up to the counter the cashier directed me to go the other window to give my coupon . The cashier whose name was Katelyn , ( not sure if I spelled it correctly because she had it flipped around so u couldn't see her name. The only way I knew her name was because after she was so very disrespectful and the Rudest person I have ever come across in my life . I asked her for her name. Also the pharmacist acted like nothing had happened. Where do they get these people?  I wouldn't u se this pharmacy if it was the last on earth! Katelyn needs to learn some manners!

leads.address: 1150 W Plymouth St, Bremen, IN 46506, USA
leads.worst_review_text: Poor service from one particular lead person and is rude, condescending and cuts you off mid sentence. If there was another CVS close to me Id  go there but Iam stuck with this one.

Today was my first and last encounter with this Walgreens pharmacy. Went in to fill a cough medicine prescription for my brother and the man at the Consultation window acted like I was bothering him. Told me they were out of it and handed the Rx back to me. No smile or attempt to be friendly, no suggestion as to other pharmacies in the area to try, nothing. I will never go back in there.
I drove to the Villa Rica, Georgia Walgreens where I was helped by the nicest, friendliest pharmacy assistant and got the Rx filled. Difference between the two pharmacy employees like night and day.

I went to Ace & Tate yesterday on a recommendation. The eye test was okay. The advice and service were simply poor. First, they measured the prescription of my current glasses. My lenses weren't clean. At any other optician, my lenses would have been cleaned before being returned to me. This wasn't the case yesterday! After I finished the eye test, I was led back into the salesroom, and then I stood there, as if I had ordered them and not picked them up. There was no handover to the colleagues, nor did they feel any responsibility for me as a customer. To be honest, I would have preferred to leave.

Service definitely looks different to me.

Normally, I wouldn't give this branch any stars, especially not for one of the employees. I've always been very satisfied until now. My usual branches in Würzburg and Kitzingen are unfortunately closed, which is why I chose this one in Nuremberg. But what happened here is beyond words. The salesperson didn't even stand up when I walked in. They were incredibly rude, disrespectful, and ultimately just plain cheeky. They tried to convince me I was someone else and even tried to overwrite another customer's information. Speechless. Never again will I go to that salesperson! If I could give negative stars, they would get the maximum.

I then decided to make an appointment at another branch, since I've usually been very happy with my previous glasses.

It's just a shame that I can't report something like this to a higher authority, since the chat is only handled by AI, and it's very difficult to describe the whole situation. This salesperson simply shouldn't be working in sales.

leads.business_name: Optik Schlemmer am Weißen Turm - Brillen & Kontaktlinsen in Nürnberg
leads.worst_review_text:
PLEASE BE CAREFUL, they charge 10 % processing fee in case the customer is not happy with the product. Most of the others in the Region do not charge any processing fee .

I was cheated here. I went in there with a request to make "Bildschirmarbeitsplatzbrille " but instead the salesperson "Peter" sold me normal "gleitsichtbrille". He never warned me about the problems which one faces with the "gleitsichtbrille". He promised me that I will be able to work with them. After I ordered and paid for them I was told that no they are not good enough for working but i still need them and I can order the
"Bildschirmarbeitsplatzbrille " separately for a discount.

I ended up returning the Glasses and loose 70 Euros and time.

Please do check with Your optician what is their policy for Processing Charges. In my case I paid up for nothing because the Salesperson cheated me with the wrong advice. Do not trust this Optician atleast the Branch near WasserTurm

They charged me two times from my EC Karte. I will go there to solve the problem. I bought contact lens solution 7,70€ and I saw in my account two times 7,70€ just 10 seconds diference tranzaction. The first transaction doesn’t worked and I put my card again in POS and they said the second time worked but in reallity they charged me twice.
Thank you

Never again!

Last year, I bought my second pair of glasses from Eyes & More (initially very enthusiastic). However, it quickly became clear that they were just overpriced junk. With everyday use, they bent badly twice and had to be readjusted. Of course, this always carried the risk of the temples breaking. Last night, it finally happened. After just one year of normal use, the glasses broke in two! I'm left without glasses and now have to buy a new pair within a day. As a student, I don't have the financial means to buy new glasses every year just because a store doesn't care about quality. I'm just incredibly disappointed!!! I'd love to get most of my money back so I can at least afford a new pair.

leads.business_name: BIERLEIN UNITED OPTICS - Ihr Optiker in Nürnberg
leads.worst_review_text:
Friendly, helpful advice. However, I'm completely dissatisfied with the lenses.
If I don't look 100% straight through the glasses, my vision isn't just blurry, but also distorted. Straight edges become curved, the steps in the stairwell are significantly steeper than in reality, and even when driving, the side mirror is somewhere completely different when looking ahead.
Unfortunately, these glasses are far too dangerous to use.

leads.business_name: Mister Spex Optiker Nürnberg / Breite Gasse
leads.worst_review_text: Some staff I had to deal with lacked customer service skills, leading to a below-average experience. There are better opticians in Nuremberg.

leads.address: 3200 S Las Vegas Blvd #1670, Las Vegas, NV 89109, USA
9191 W Flamingo Rd Suite 120, Las Vegas, NV 89147, USA
leads.worst_review_text:
Back in the country and thought this place was nice from one recommendation i was given by the doctor itself.
However do urself a favor "Dont ever go to this place"
Two women run this place with zero knowledge.
Adriana and kim who uses her title to talk to people with utmost rudeness and disrespec "i am the Director of operations she said with all that voice she had"
They just need you to come in for a check up and prescribe glasses without any reason.
The glasses i must say made with least amount of quality in them. When i asked for second check up they clearly gave me an appointment but said if your not taking glasses from us we do not need to see you again. So it is all about the money and not about care for your eyes or for your child that you bring to this place.
Hopefully Dr Yesnick knows who he has hired and how customers are treated when they are not liked and when they raise questions on their glasses, quality and how your child was examined. They gave me such a hard time to return glasses my kids were having constant headaches from, refused to reassess, refused to give me a refund respectfully, wrote the wrong name on the cheque inspite of taking my Id and having all my details. And then with an excuse " our refund policy "
Has changed we will apply that to this particular case even though calls are being recorded and i spoke to one of their staff members ( who dont give their names) for a full refund.
They need to apply mere restocking fee for every lie they bring up and make us order these glasses.
Well done! Below zero customer service standards.
And yes i refuse for you re examine my childs eye if your standards are this low. I will take my business elsewhere without hesitation.

From a mother!!

leads.address: 2121 Civic Center Dr, North Las Vegas, NV 89030, USA
4505 W Charleston Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89102, USA

leads.business_name: Eye District Express (Dr. Romy Park OD)
leads.address: 3900 Spring Mountain Rd A-1, Las Vegas, NV 89102, USA
2580 S Decatur Blvd #6, Las Vegas, NV 89102, USA
leads.worst_review_text:
I booked an appointment here earlier this week and was genuinely excited to see a new optometrist. I arrived 15 minutes early, but the greeting I received was anything but welcoming. A visibly annoyed woman came to the front desk told me there was no appointment scheduled for me, not today or any other day.

I calmly asked, “So what’s next?” She replied in a tone like I was inconveniencing her: “Not until next Tuesday.” I quickly checked my work schedule asked if there was anything else. Her response? A dismissive “Wellllll…” with zero apology or effort.

At that point, I asked, “Am I bothering you? You seem like you’d rather be anywhere but here helping me.” She stared at me blankly and said, “I’m just telling you, you don’t have an appointment.” At that point. I told her to forget it, I’d find another provider.

Dr. Cheung may have great reviews, but they’re completely overshadowed by the unprofessional front desk staff. Losing a client might not matter to much, but maybe bad reviews do.

Dr. Cheung, find someone who WANTS to work, and would be happy to great your clients kindly.

leads.business_name: Hampton by Hilton Vienna City West

leads.worst_review_text:
We booked a table for New Year's Eve 7 weeks in advance and got it confirmed. However, it was suddenly canceled just three days before New Year's Eve without any reason. How can that be!? This restaurant has a good rating on Google and we thought it would be a reliable and high quality restaurant, but it turned out to be the opposite and had no commercial credibility at all! We have to find a new restaurant on very short notice.

“Thank you”for ruining our New Year's Eve.👎

Its always fully oacked, disgusting with a little of obdachlose that stink. You need to be very careful with your things because there is also a lit of stealing going on. DB needs to seriously take a lot into consideration not only the unbelievable amount of delays

Only positive is the location and it feels like the hotel knows this with the lack of care and customer service that they exhibit.
It took us 40 minutes to check in. Eventually we made it to the room and it was unbearably hot (note the stay was in Nov). We booked a double and were given a twin and at check in told that they only clean rooms every 4 days so we wouldn't get any housekeeping. Im ok with the principal of asking for this on a city break but they only provided 1 towel per person- do they really expect you to go 4 days showering when you have been out in a city each day with 1 towel?!
The room was ridiculously hot- we were told heating is centrally controlled and all rooms were that hot, we couldn't change room and the best thing we could do is "open a window". For context on how hot it was, we had 3 windows open overnight and I still woke up dehydrated with a sore head and neither of us slept with any covers. We were told air conditioning in the hotel doesn't work.
We were asked if we wanted the twin to be made a double and despite the 5 reminders we gave them, we stayed 3 nights with twin beds.
We asked for fresh towels and they never came, eventually it became "self service" where reception could only give me 1 towel.
We were on the 6th floor and the elevator broke which was brilliant when trailing luggage downstairs!
There are 2 entrances to get to the hotel- from Mariahilfer you have to fo through a dark passage where there can be homeless people- i would not recommend this to lone travellers.
When we checked out, we were asked for pay €9 for WiFi despite the signs saying its free- given how poor the experience was, we walked out and refused to pay.

Unpleasant experience with unnecessary discussion about legally permissible medications

I am a licensed dentist and wanted to purchase some medications for my own use (L-thyroxine, ebastine, and Dymista nasal spray) from this pharmacy.
I was initially refused dispensing them on the grounds that they were "unrelated to their specialty."
This is factually and legally incorrect, as according to Section 13 Paragraph 2 No. 1 and Section 96 Paragraph 2 of the German Medicines Act (AMG), doctors and dentists are expressly authorized to purchase medications for their own use, regardless of their specialty.

Only after a lengthy discussion was some of the medications finally handed over to me; the rest had to be ordered. I drove back to the pharmacy that same evening, five hours later, to pick up the ordered medications.
They forgot the medications during the delivery, even though they had noted my phone number, and there was no call back.
I was told to come back the next day.
The following day, the delivery was again incomplete; the medications were either not delivered or forgotten, and again there was no call.

I ultimately had to demand my money back.

I find this behavior unprofessional, disrespectful, and lacking in organization, especially when dealing with a licensed colleague.

The entire process seemed petty, distrustful, and uncooperative.

A modicum of trust and respect for other healthcare professionals would go a long way here.

I hope that the team will be better informed in the future and will no longer put patients or colleagues in such unnecessary situations.

Completely unprofessional pharmacy!!

The brown-haired Turkish employee – her name is Kedik, she has brown eyes, not particularly long, and is absolutely awful.

I asked her several times for a specific brand of medication. She wouldn't listen and shouted that they didn't have Xy. I even mentioned the brand. Then she started arguing strangely because I asked her not to shout out the medication so loudly, as I didn't want everyone to hear. And after that, she refused to serve me anymore.

What kind of kindergarten is this place? Apparently, when the boss isn't there, they play strange games? In the end, she even laughed as I left.

This employee named Kedik doesn't listen to the customer, constantly makes strange faces, and tries to embarrass them. She acted in a purely manipulative manner, as if she were right there in the pharmacy!!!

She also claims to be close friends with the boss.

She wouldn't give me her name, but she's on good terms with the boss... I wasted an extra 20 minutes arguing so that another colleague could serve me immediately with the exact brand I was looking for! It's a shame for a pharmacy like this that employees like her can drag it down so much.

I'll be keeping an eye on that colleague; she can keep laughing all the way to her own head.

leads.address: 121 E El Camino Real, Mountain View, CA 94040, USA
leads.worst_review_text: I think someone should consider offering to reviewers a zero, no stars, rating. And this is exactly what this pharmacy store should receive. I spent 45 minutes in the store this Saturday evening waiting to pick up my meds. When I arrived, there were only two of us waiting for medications. More people started coming in later on. I was still penitently waiting and was first in line. A young lady, a pharmacy tech behind the counter that appeared of the Indian origin, with a long hear in her pony tail, called another lady by her name, who was behind me in the line, to come to the counter to pick up her meds. They two new each other privately. After the customer was done I asked the tech, when is my turn to get her help and her name. She refused to give me her name. I had to talk to her supervisor about how wrong is to call someone from the line and completely ignoring customers who were next in line. I will never step again in that sore, but rather get my meds  delivered. Avoid them!

How in the world is this place 4 star? If this place is 4 star, i am a divorced penguin with panda kids. The wifi here is slower than a deceased turtle. I got a dopamine detox during my stay here. I don’t remember what youtube is anymore. The guy at the reception was sweet, I hope you find happiness in your life. And please don’t work overnight shifts, it causes cancer. Dear owner of Atlanta hotel, the fact that you named your hotel after Atlanta speaks volumes about your lack of knowledge of how terrible Atlanta downtown is. But they still have faster wifi than this place. Please lower your rank to 2 stars or buy new routers. I recommend ASUS gaming routers, those are nice. For people considering this place, please find a new place. I will not update you if they have new routers cuz I will be busy telling everyone the wifi is slow here. Thank you for reading this nonsense. I hope you start chasing your dreams today!

We stayed at this hotel for four nights. I wouldn't rate it as a place worth staying even for two days. The room comes with a miniature shampoo and soap, towels, and a hairdryer, but that's it. The shampoo is awful and disgusting... I hope they'll replace it. If there's no shower gel... then at least give  a good shampoo to your guests. There's no kettle, coffee, or tea in the room; you can get some at reception, but you can't take drinks into your room. Since the hotel is full of elderly people, you won't get any tea, and there might not be a place to sit and drink tea. Breakfast is a real disappointment.
Ps. Even if its 3 stars ...I think guests still expect good service. It's no longer a luxury for hotels to have a kettle, even just for the winter, or cotton swabs for cleaning ears...these are basic hygiene needs...Shampoo combination 2 in 1 ( 20ml) for hair and whole body...great combo. But if even a hostel has this, and a 3-star hotel doesn't, then call yourself a Guest House for uninvited guests. And of course, as they recommended me to choose 4, 5 stars hotel ( in theirs answer to my comment) for future trip...I Will definitely, never come back to this "hotel ".

Avoid at all cost. When I came in there was 2 people on my room! They said they paid in cash to someone or simply I think they just stayed and no one checked the rooms.
The codes for the room are not changed. No one answered the calls on the line. The rooms are dirty - same as the spare parts. It's smelly in there of cigarettes and other staff. Most of the ppl there are walking half naked.
The rooms are hot - the air conditioning is just a fan in the ceiling and it's not doing anything - just noisy.
Book something else - this place is just a joke and not managed properly.

I don’t know how it’s possible that this place has so many positive reviews. At first glance everything seems fine, but unfortunately only until you open the door to the room. It’s clear that the rooms have seen better days-for example, scratched walls or worn leather upholstery on the bed. After unpacking your belongings, you start planning your next steps for sightseeing in Vienna and sorting out transportation, only to soon realize that the hotel internet is unstable and often doesn’t work at all (you can’t even send a message on Facebook). Despite trying to report the problem, the staff simply shrug and claim they can’t help.
You spend the day out in the city and return to the hotel to wash up and recharge for the next day. It turns out that the hotel is unable to provide toothpaste, separate body wash, shampoo, or towels in good condition-the towel waiting for me in the room had a hole the size of a hand. The list of discrepancies with the hotel’s description is topped off by the lack of soundproofing. Unfortunately, everything can be heard from the hallway: every sentence, every step, and every door closing by other hotel guests.

Extremely disappointed experience.

We had a fully paid reservation (€560) and had to cancel due to unexpected circumstances shortly before arrival. We understand the hotel’s cancellation policy, however almost the full amount was kept and only €15 was refunded. What was most frustrating is that the hotel refused any flexibility, even when we asked to reinstate the reservation and stay in the room we had already paid for. We were told we would need to pay the full price again. For us, this was a decent amount of money, and the complete lack of understanding or goodwill left a very negative impression. We wouldn’t recommend this hotel if you value customer care and flexibility.

We advise future guests to think twice before booking, especially if there is any risk of changes to their plans.

leads.worst_review_text:
Location was the only great thing about this hotel!

**Room cleaning - very bad. Same items dropped on the floor weren’t picked up. First day upon arrival we saw a bottle cap under the bed. My strand of hair om the shower door was left there for a WHOLE WEEK & I didn’t even remove it to see if they will clean up or not. Lots of strands of hair were scattered in the toilet and under the sink (not cleaned or brushed). I doubted they even vacuumed the room!!!

**Water bottles - takes them over an hour to supply us with 2 water bottles. & when we requested for “cold” water bottles- they made us pay 5€ as “cold” water bottles cannot be provided by the hotel and must be paid to receive them from restaurant…FOR THE SAME BOTTLE!! I had meds to take and had to wait over an hour for these bottles!!!!

**In Room Dining - their food was delicious…however the cutlery they served the food in and the trolley they brought in had a very pungent METALLIC smell to it to the point where we couldn’t finish our food and took the whole thing out!! The sheets on the trolleys stank as well!! Seems like there is something seriously wrong with the cleaning process

**Spa - i went to get a massage….THE INDOOR Swimming POOL RIGHT NEXT TO THE MASSAGE ROOM was a disaster !! I could hear kids screaming all through my massage session! Disastrous!!

**Room soundproofing- i could hear footsteps, door slamming all day and night!!! I would wakeup from the middle of my sleep from how utterly annoying it was!!! Really really bad! I am a deep sleeper actually & was still jumping from my sleep from how loud the door slamming could be heard!!
